page.title: 11SALES OF HOMES
page.content: Chapel St. Leonards is a small coastal resort ideal for people retiring from their work or business and wishing to buy a home by the sea. As Chapel St. Leonards is only 2 hours by car from the midland towns we get many people moving here from Nottingham, Sheffeild, Leicester and neighbouring towns. The type of property they usually buy is a detached modern bungalow with two bedrooms, garage and central heating at a purchase price of up to Â£25,000. This type of property makes up about 80% of the property we sell. The other 20% being family houses, guest houses or buisnesses. Many of the older people who retire here move back to their home towns when their husband or wife dies. 17% of the propertys are owned by people who use them for second homes for holidays.70% of Chapel are retired.
